pkgmetadata.longdescription: Integrated Postsecondary Education Data System (IPEDS) Access // The Integrated Postsecondary Education Data System (IPEDS) is the core postsecondary education data collection system for the National Center for Education Statistics (NCES). IPEDS provides a mechanism to upload survey data from institutions in XML format. This package provides functions to assist in the generating XML files that can then be uploaded to IPEDS as well as download data from the IPEDS website.
